channel.title: math.HO updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.HO updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Build Boy's Surface
item.description: arXiv:2601.10755v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: This article describes Boy's surface in a nice way that does not make many demands on three-dimensional visualization. The article includes a kit that you can print out onto card stock and assemble with scissors and tape.
item.dc:creator: Richard Evan Schwartz

item.title: On Arnold's and Pushkin's puzzles
item.description: arXiv:2601.10766v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We discuss and draw the reader's attention to several passages in Vladimir Arnold's note on the epigraph to the novel in verse "Evgenii Onegin" by A.S.Pushkin, as well as to puzzles hidden in the novel by the poet himself.
item.arxiv:journal_reference: Vladimir Arnold: Collected Works, vol.VII, Springer Nature, 2025, pp.497-500
item.dc:creator: Boris Khesin
